patthana19.15:1.1_0: Naajjhattaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca bahiddhā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
patthana19.15:2.1_0: Nabahiddhā dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhatto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana19.15:4.1_0: Naajjhattārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … dve.
patthana19.15:5.1_0: Nabahiddhārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … dve.
patthana19.15:6.1_0: Naajjhattārammaṇañca nabahiddhārammaṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … dve. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana19.15:7.1_1: adhipatiyā dve …pe… purejāte āsevane dve …pe… avigate cha.
